text: Thomas Babington. "Tom" Boulton OBE (6 November 1925-1 July 2016) was president of the Association of Anaesthetists of Great Britain and Ireland.https://www.telegraph.co.uk/obituaries/2016/07/13/dr-thomas-boulton- pioneering-anaesthetist--obituary/http://www.thetimes.co.uk/article/dr-tom- boulton-ncwrn93kk He was appointed OBE in the 1991 New Year Honours. == References == == External links == * Category:1925 births Category:2016 deaths Category:People from Bishop Auckland Category:English anaesthetists Category:Officers of the Order of the British Empire Category:University of Michigan fellows
title: Tom Boulton
